DOC.brief_summary: The Boston Scientific Energen family capable measure respiratory rate trend ( RRT ) daily basis transmission data via Remote Monitoring technology . This may result early detection imminent decompensation presymptomatic stage . The study assess respiratory trend correlation clinically relevant heart failure event .
DOC.brief_title: Multiparametric Heart Failure Evaluation Internal Cardioverter Defibrillators ( ICD ) Patients
